output.dependency: The flight identifier in column 2 indicates the specific flight, which determines the departure time in column 3.
The flight identifier in column 2 is associated with arrival times, specifically indicated in column 4.
The flight identifier in column 2 is linked to the scheduled time of a connecting flight, represented in column 5.
The flight identifier in column 2 relates to the actual time of arrival or departure, which is noted in column 6.
The scheduled departure time in column 3 is related to the scheduled arrival time in column 4 for the same flight.
The scheduled departure time in column 3 may relate to other scheduled flights indicated in column 5.
The scheduled arrival time in column 4 could potentially relate to subsequent scheduled flight times indicated in column 5.
The scheduled arrival time in column 4 is expected to correlate with the actual arrival time noted in column 6.
The scheduled time of a connecting flight in column 5 should relate to the actual time of arrival or departure as shown in column 6.
